segments.text: Mary , this is your homeroom . It's 213 . Remember that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You sit in there , listen to the morning announcement with other kids , and then you go to your classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I have to go to my homeroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do we have the same classes today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think the school can put us in the same homeroom ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stop worrying , Mary . You'll do just fine .
segments.speaker: S1
